ModMetaData.name: Medical System Expansion
ModMetaData.author: Oreno
ModMetaData.description: An expansion of vanilla medical system and how they work. Not only adds many new body part replacements and implants, but also new exclusive bionic and archotech body part system and modules, and many other features. Main Features - Installed prostheses body parts can keep there child parts. So now you don't get missing fingers or toes when installed arm or leg prosthesis parts. - New exclusive body part system and modules. You can install modules on installed bionic and archotech body part counterparts. This main features only work on bionic and archotech body parts. It doesn't make sense to me for basic and simple body parts can have this features. All Other Features - New research projects. - 2 new workbenches. - About 50+ new prostheses parts and implants. - Adds prostheses parts and implants to trader. - Balancing vanilla prostheses parts and implants. - Almost all vanilla organs and limbs can be harvested. - Harvested organs and limbs can rot and decay. - Now all bones can be destroyed by damage or attack. - Split rib cage to 12 pair of ribs. Many new features are still being planned. As much as possible this mod uses xpath or harmony to patch vanilla or any other mod so i can use it with 300+ mod modlist i have.
